To reset your password, please follow these steps:

1. Log in to the employee portal using your username and current password.
2. Click on your profile picture or initials in the top right corner, then select "Account Settings."
3. Scroll down to the "Security" section and click on "Reset Password."
4. Enter a new password and confirm it by re-entering it in the next field.
5. Click "Save Changes."

If you need assistance or have questions about resetting your password, please contact our IT Helpdesk at (555) 123-4567 or [it.support@company.com](mailto:it.support@company.com).

Please note that all password reset requests will be reviewed and verified by our security team to ensure compliance with company policies.
